item.title: U.S. oil prices edge lower on weak Chinese retail-sales data
item.description: Oil prices headed lower Monday as concerns over the outlook for energy demand were renewed by a batch of economic data in China that showed retail-sales growth unexpectedly weakened in November.

item.title: Why it's gotten more difficult to get a free first-class upgrade
item.description: Airlines are racing to add comforts such as lie-flat seats, entertainment systems with bigger screens and even suites with closing doors.

item.title: S&P 500 rises to start the week as Wall Street gets ready for Fed meeting this week: Live updates
item.description: The S&P 500 rose slightly on Monday as investors awaited a key Federal Reserve meeting slated for this week.

item.title: The Social Security Fairness Act is a bad idea
item.description: This legislation would allow some workers to double-dip and speeds the exhaustion of the trust fund

item.title: Many New Jersey drones sightings are 'manned aircraft being misidentified as drones,' FBI says
item.description: The FBI and Department of Homeland Security said on Saturday that ongoing investigations around reported drone sightings over New Jersey have found many reports are, in fact, manned aircraft.

item.title: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz loses confidence vote, clearing the way for February election
item.description: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz on Monday lost a confidence vote in the country's Bundestag, clearing the path for an early election in February.

item.title: Broadcom is having an ‚ÄòNvidia moment‚Äô as stock swells further
item.description: The newest member of the trillion-dollar market-cap club is looking ahead to a ‚Äúlikely sharp new product ramp‚Äù in the second half of 2025, according to an analyst.

item.title: How China's satellite megaprojects are challenging Elon Musk's Starlink
item.description: China's Qianfan, Guo Wang and Honghu-3 projects have plans to put 38,000 low earth orbit satellites into space.

item.title: Bitcoin rises to new record above $106,000 ahead of this week's Fed decision
item.description: Bitcoin rallied to a new all-time high Sunday evening as investors awaited the Federal Reserve's final interest rate decision of the year.

item.description: ‚ÄúSoundHound represents an underappreciated pure play AI company,‚Äù according to Wedbush analyst Dan Ives.

item.title: From growth to gone: GM‚Äôs Cruise robotaxi business is latest growth initiative to falter
item.description: The driverless ride-hailing service was supposed to be the shining star of GM's growth plans, leading to $50 billion in revenue by the end of this decade.

item.title: French broadcaster Canal+ shares fall 20% in London listing after spinoff from Vivendi
item.description: Shares in French broadcaster Canal+ fell over 13% following their London stock market debut Monday.

item.title: Why the investor craze for Ozempic and rival weight-loss drugs may resume next year
item.description: Novo Nordisk‚Äôs takeover of Catalent and the Danish firm‚Äôs push to launch a new generation of drugs could boost the importance of GLP agonists in 2025, Barclays analysts said

item.title: Why fast-food companies like KFC and Chick-fil-A are betting on chicken tenders again
item.description: Fast-food companies like KFC, Taco Bell and McDonald's are getting back into chicken tenders to boost sales and capitalize on the next chicken trend.

item.title: Softbank CEO and Trump to announce $100 billion investment in U.S. by firm
item.description: The money will be deployed before the end of Trump's term.
